alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 5:23AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...PATCHY DENSE FREEZING FOG MAY IMPACT MORNING COMMUTE... Patchy dense freezing fog has started to develop in portions of northeast Georgia and the western South Carolina Upstate this morning, mainly around Lake Keowee, Lake Hartwell, and Lake Russell. Visibility may be reduced to as low as one quarter mile within the vicinity of the lakes. Because temperatures are below freezing across these areas, fog droplets may freeze on elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses. Fog should start to lift around mid-morning. Make sure to drive with low beam headlights on and give yourself plenty of distance between cars.

area.areaDesc: Abbeville; Anderson; Greater Oconee; Greater Pickens; Oconee Mountains; Pickens Mountains
